title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-1.4 - Isolation rooms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-1.4 - Isolation rooms

State Regulations
A nursing home shall have at least one single bed
isolation room that is ventilated to the outside and includes a private toilet
and handwashing facilities, equipped with other than hand
controls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
713-1.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
